BugInstance.message: Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.opengauss.check.datasource.OpenGaussDataSourceChecker.checkPrivilege(DataSource) converts checked exception to unchecked

Constrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.opengauss.ddlgenerator.OpenGaussCreateTableSQLGenerator.generate(DataSource, String, String) converts checked exception to unchecked instead of another allowable checked exception
This use of java/sql/Statement.executeQuery(Ljava/lang/String;)Ljava/sql/ResultSet; can be vulnerable to SQL injection (with JDBC)
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.opengauss.ingest.OpenGaussPositionInitializer.getUniqueSlotName(Connection, String) encodes String bytes without specifying the character encoding
This use of java/sql/Connection.prepareStatement(Ljava/lang/String;)Ljava/sql/PreparedStatement; can be vulnerable to SQL injection (with JDBC)
This use of java/sql/Connection.prepareCall(Ljava/lang/String;)Ljava/sql/CallableStatement; can be vulnerable to SQL injection (with JDBC)
This API MD5 (MDX) is not a recommended cryptographic hash function
Constrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.opengauss.ingest.OpenGaussWALDumper.runBlocking() converts checked exception to unchecked
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.opengauss.ingest.OpenGaussWALDumper.processEventWithTX(AbstractWALEvent) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

Method new org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.opengauss.ingest.OpenGaussWALDumper(DumperConfiguration, IngestPosition, PipelineChannel, PipelineTableMetaDataLoader) defines parameters more abstractly than needed to function properly

org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.opengauss.ingest.wal.OpenGaussLogicalReplication.createReplicationStream(PgConnection, BaseLogSequenceNumber, String): 1st parameter 'connection' could be declared as org.opengauss.PGConnection instead
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.opengauss.ingest.wal.decode.MppdbDecodingPlugin.readColumnData(String, String) is excessively complex, with a cyclomatic complexity of 84
Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.opengauss.ingest.wal.decode.MppdbDecodingPlugin.readColumnData(String, String) converts checked exception to unchecked
Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.opengauss.ingest.wal.decode.MppdbDecodingPlugin.readColumnData(String, String) converts checked exception to unchecked
Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.opengauss.ingest.wal.decode.MppdbDecodingPlugin.readTableEvent(String) converts checked exception to unchecked
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.opengauss.ingest.wal.decode.MppdbDecodingPlugin.decodeBytea(String) encodes String bytes without specifying the character encoding
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.opengauss.ingest.wal.decode.MppdbDecodingPlugin.decodeDataWithTX(String) converts String to boxed primitive using excessive boxing
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.opengauss.ingest.wal.decode.MppdbDecodingPlugin.readColumnData(String, String) converts String to boxed primitive using excessive boxing
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.opengauss.ingest.wal.decode.MppdbDecodingPlugin.readColumnData(String, String) converts String to boxed primitive using excessive boxing
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.opengauss.ingest.wal.decode.MppdbDecodingPlugin.readColumnData(String, String) converts String to boxed primitive using excessive boxing
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.opengauss.ingest.wal.decode.MppdbDecodingPlugin.readColumnData(String, String) converts String to boxed primitive using excessive boxing
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.opengauss.ingest.wal.decode.MppdbDecodingPlugin.readColumnData(String, String) converts String to boxed primitive using excessive boxing
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.opengauss.ingest.wal.decode.MppdbDecodingPlugin.decodeDataWithTX(String) passes constant String of length 1 to character overridden method
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.opengauss.ingest.wal.decode.MppdbDecodingPlugin.readColumnData(String, String) returns more specific type of object than declared
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.opengauss.sqlbuilder.OpenGaussPipelineSQLBuilder.buildConflictSQL(DataRecord) passes constant String of length 1 to character overridden method
